Mask_1.description:
Ah, this old thing... I found it on the ground a while back, but I don't remember where. It looks pretty though, so it's got to be worth a bit.

(Increases the holder's health by 1.)

Mask_2.description:
Now, this mask is in much better condition than the last. That's why it costs more, too, ho ho!

(Increases the holder's health by 1.)

Mask_3.description:
This is one of my oldest masks, but it still looks untouched by the years... unlike the others. Your shell will surely thank you if you decide to take it.

(Increases the holder's health by 1.)

Mask_4.description:
Behold, my greatest work! This is a mask I created myself, and the process was long and arduous. But if you have what it takes to keep the power that it gives, it will be yours.

(Increases the holder's health by 1.)

Nail_Upgrade_Kit_1.description:
A simple sharpening kit that can be used on that mighty nail of yours. It will make you feared on the battlefield.

(Increases the holder's damage by 2.)

Nail_Upgrade_Kit_2.description:
You want to sharpen your 'Life Ender' again, eh? Not to worry, I can help you... but first, you'll have to give me some more of your shinies!

(Increases the holder's damage by 2.)

Wall_Jump.description:
These grips will give you just enough time to jump off most walls. Don't try to hang onto one though, or you'll most likely hurt yourself when you reach the ground.

(Grants the holder the ability to Wall Jump, allowing them to scale great heights.)
(Press Z while touching the side of a wall to jump off it.)

Dash.description:
Rumours say this cloak makes you go very fast. Honestly, I don't understand how that works, but it looks like it's high quality, so at least you'll get yourself something valuable in return for your money.

(Grants the holder the ability to Dash, in order to cover more distance or to quickly escape danger.)
(Press C to dash.)

Double_Jump.description:
Beautiful, shiny wings. I don't think they can make you fly, but I'm sure they can give you a little boost when you need one.

(Grants the holder the ability to Double Jump, defying the powers that keep one on the ground.)
(Press Z while mid-air to jump again.)
